title: (Mon Early Bird) Bobby Is Struggling Making Adult Friends + Morgan Has Breaking Relationship News + Mailbag: I Found Out I Have A Son
itunes:title: (Mon Early Bird) Bobby Is Struggling Making Adult Friends + Morgan Has Breaking Relationship News + Mailbag: I Found Out I Have A Son
description:
Bobby shares that he is struggling with making adult friendships. Especially with one guy in particular and he shares his situation where he is the only one to initiate hanging out. Morgan drops some relationship news that makes our jaw drop!!!. In the mailbag, Bobby tries to help a listener who had a 20 year old show up to his door over the weekend and claim to be his son. How does he tell his wife?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
